section.title: Tutorial: Using the Android Location API
Create Project
section.para: Create a new project called de.vogella.android.locationapi.simple with the Activity called ShowLocationActivity .
This example will not use the Google Map therefore, it also runs on an Android device.
Change your layout file from the res/layout folder to the following code.

section.title: Add permissions
section.para:
Add the following permissions to your application in your AndroidManifest.xml file
INTERNET
ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION

section.title: Activity
section.para: Change ShowLocationActivity to the following. It queries the location manager and display the queried values in the activity.
